main event: On January 28, 1962, a group of astronomers observed 8-12 unidentified objects flying in close proximity to each other in Morehead, Kentucky.
interesting points: The objects were seen flying in a group formation without a clear arrangement,One object notably changed its position from right to left while in flight,The color of the objects was described as white but dull with steady movement and no sound,The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 8 seconds before the objects disappeared from view,An amateur astronomer conducted an analysis and ruled out the possibility of the objects being birds or balloons.
